description: Try our easy to follow Oat & Raisin Cookies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cookie,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Baking,Quick & easy dessert,Father's Day,Soy free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Oat & Raisin Cookies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs dairy-free spread, melted, cooled slightly

recipeInstructions.text: Place half of the oats in a food processor. Add flour, baking powder and cinnamon. Pulse until oats are finely chopped. Transfer to a bowl and stir in remaining oats, coconut and raisins. Rub the raisins into the dry ingredients with your fingers to stop them clumping together. Whisk maple syrup, spread, egg and vanilla together in a jug. Add to the flour mixture and stir until well combined. Chill dough for 30 minutes.
Preheat oven to 170Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper.

Roll dough into golf-ball sized balls and arrange on baking trays. Flatten with the floured base of a glass or a measuring cup. Bake for 15-18 minutes or until golden. Cool for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack.
